row.process:
@echo off
!----------------------------------------------- Parameter validation ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER_SWARM.PUB.INCLUDE.CONNECTION_PARAM_LOG
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Service Name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SERVICE_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
! -------------------------------------Building input parameters----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER_SWARM.PUB.INCLUDE.PREPARE_CMD@WIN
: SET &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_CMD# = 'docker &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_OPTIONS# service rm '
! Service Name(s) : DEFINE &SERVICE_NAMES#, string, 100 : FILL &SERVICE_NAMES#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SERVICE_NAME#,",") : SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&SERVICE_NAMES#[],SIZE) : SET &VAR# = 1 : WHILE &VAR# LE &LEN# : SET &VAR# = FORMAT(&VAR#,"0") : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &SERVICE_NAMES#[&VAR#] : IF &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# <> "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER_SWARM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_CMD#, ' &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#') : ENDIF : SET &VAR# = &VAR#+ 1 : ENDWHILE
! LOGGING COMMAND : PRINT "EXECUTING DELETE SERVICE COMMAND: &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_CMD#"
! ------------------------------------------ INVOKING COMMAND LINE ------------------------------------------ &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_CMD#
!Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** DELETE SERVICE ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** DELETE SERVICE ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------Check error level -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER_SWARM.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS@WIN
